title: Ticket #3089: Reduce size of classad::Value
description: The contents of the classad::Value class can be rearranged to save 16 bytes per object. This is done by changing members absTimeValueSecs and strValue into pointers and moving them into the union. This results in 16 bytes saved for every literal value that appears in any parsed expression. A quick test of a collector with 2000 slot ads showed a memory reduction of 3%.
